login-cta-popup.title: Time to log in.

404.title: Not quite what you were looking for.
404.message: Sorry, but the page you were looking for doesn't exist.

500.title: Houston, we have a problem.
500.message: Something went wrong, but don't worry, it's not you. Please try again later.
